name: The Lost Island (itch) (AlanKilby, Syph7)
description:
You wake up on a strange island where you’ve never been before. The only way to leave is to collect all the keys to open a magic door that will bring you back home. But there is a little problem… The inhabitants of the island who may help you do not speak the same language as you. You will have to do your best to communicate properly ! 

Use left click to move and right click to interact. You can use the notebook in the upper right corner of the game to write with the local alphabet.  Remember, this is not a guessing game, every wrong answer will cost you. Good luck !
